briefdescription.para: Resets the current reading of the Inertial Sensor's heading to zero.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Resets the current reading of the Inertial Sensor's rotation to zero.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Resets the current reading of the Inertial Sensor's pitch to zero.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Resets the current reading of the Inertial Sensor's roll to zero.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Resets the current reading of the Inertial Sensor's yaw to zero.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Reset all 3 euler values of the Inertial Sensor to 0.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Resets all 5 values of the Inertial Sensor to 0.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Sets the current reading of the Inertial Sensor's euler values to target euler values.

detaileddescription.para: Will default to +/- 180 if target exceeds +/- 180.

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21
Target euler values for the euler values to be set to

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Sets the current reading of the Inertial Sensor's rotation to target value.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21
Target value for the rotation value to be set to

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Sets the current reading of the Inertial Sensor's heading to target value Target will default to 360 if above 360 and default to 0 if below 0.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21
Target value for the heading value to be set to

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Sets the current reading of the Inertial Sensor's pitch to target value Will default to +/- 180 if target exceeds +/- 180.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21
Target value for the pitch value to be set to

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Sets the current reading of the Inertial Sensor's roll to target value Will default to +/- 180 if target exceeds +/- 180.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21
Target value for the roll value to be set to

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Sets the current reading of the Inertial Sensor's yaw to target value Will default to +/- 180 if target exceeds +/- 180.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21
Target value for the yaw value to be set to

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: The IMU is calibrating.
Used to indicate that an error state was reached in the imu_get_status function,.

inbodydescription.para: Percieved Pitch based on GPS + IMU
Percieved Roll based on GPS + IMU
Percieved Yaw based on GPS + IMU

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t port, double xInitial, double yInitial, double headingInitial, double xOffset, double yOffset)
memberdef.name: gps_initialize_full

briefdescription.para: Set the GPS's offset relative to the center of turning in meters, as well as its initial position.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as a GPS EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 GPS port number from 1-21
Cartesian 4-Quadrant X offset from center of turning (meters)
Cartesian 4-Quadrant Y offset from center of turning (meters)
Initial 4-Quadrant X Position, with (0,0) being at the center of the field (meters)
Initial 4-Quadrant Y Position, with (0,0) being at the center of the field (meters)
Heading with 0 being north on the field, in degrees [0,360) going clockwise

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Set the GPS's offset relative to the center of turning in meters.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as a GPS EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 GPS port number from 1-21
Cartesian 4-Quadrant X offset from center of turning (meters)
Cartesian 4-Quadrant Y offset from center of turning (meters)

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Get the GPS's location relative to the center of turning/origin in meters.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as a GPS EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 GPS port number from 1-21
Pointer to cartesian 4-Quadrant X offset from center of turning (meters)
Pointer to cartesian 4-Quadrant Y offset from center of turning (meters)

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t port, double xInitial, double yInitial, double headingInitial)
memberdef.name: gps_set_position

briefdescription.para: Sets the robot's location relative to the center of the field in meters.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as a GPS EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 GPS port number from 1-21
Initial 4-Quadrant X Position, with (0,0) being at the center of the field (meters)
Initial 4-Quadrant Y Position, with (0,0) being at the center of the field (meters)
Heading with 0 being north on the field, in degrees [0,360) going clockwise

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Set the GPS sensor's data rate in milliseconds, only applies to IMU on GPS.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as a GPS EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 GPS port number from 1-21
Data rate in milliseconds (Minimum: 5 ms)

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Get the possible RMS (Root Mean Squared) error in meters for GPS position.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as a GPS EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 GPS port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: Possible RMS (Root Mean Squared) error in meters for GPS position. If the operation failed, returns PROS_ERR_F and errno is set.

briefdescription.para: Gets the position and roll, yaw, and pitch of the GPS.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as a GPS EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 GPS port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: A struct (gps_status_s_t) containing values mentioned above. If the operation failed, all the structure's members are filled with PROS_ERR_F and errno is set.

briefdescription.para: Get the heading in [0,360) degree values.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as a GPS EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 GPS port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The heading in [0,360) degree values. If the operation failed, returns PROS_ERR_F and errno is set.

briefdescription.para: Get the heading in the max double value and min double value scale.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as a GPS EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 GPS port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The heading in [DOUBLE_MIN, DOUBLE_MAX] values. If the operation fails, returns PROS_ERR_F and errno is set.

briefdescription.para: Gets the GPS sensor's elapsed rotation value.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as a GPS EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 GPS port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The elased heading in degrees. If the operation fails, returns PROS_ERR_F and errno is set.

briefdescription.para: Set the GPS sensor's rotation value to target value.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as a GPS EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 GPS port number from 1-21
Target rotation value to set rotation value to

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Tare the GPS sensor's rotation value.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as a GPS EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 GPS port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Get the GPS's raw gyroscope values.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as a GPS EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 GPS port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The raw gyroscope values. If the operation failed, all the structure's members are filled with PROS_ERR_F and errno is set.

briefdescription.para: Get the GPS's raw accelerometer values.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an GPS EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 GPS's port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The raw accelerometer values. If the operation failed, all the structure's members are filled with PROS_ERR_F and errno is set.

briefdescription.para: Calibrate IMU.

detaileddescription.para: Calibration takes approximately 2 seconds, but this function only blocks until the IMU status flag is set properly to E_IMU_STATUS_CALIBRATING, with a minimum blocking time of 5ms.

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is already calibrating, or time out setting the status flag.

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Set the Inertial Sensor's refresh interval in milliseconds.

detaileddescription.para: The rate may be specified in increments of 5ms, and will be rounded down to the nearest increment. The minimum allowable refresh rate is 5ms. The default rate is 10ms.

As values are copied into the shared memory buffer only at 10ms intervals, setting this value to less than 10ms does not mean that you can poll the sensor's values any faster. However, it will guarantee that the data is as recent as possible.

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21
The data refresh interval in milliseconds

simplesect.para: 1 if the operation was successful or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Get the total number of degrees the Inertial Sensor has spun about the z-axis.

detaileddescription.para: This value is theoretically unbounded. Clockwise rotations are represented with positive degree values, while counterclockwise rotations are represented with negative ones.

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The degree value or PROS_ERR_F if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Get the Inertial Sensor's heading relative to the initial direction of its x-axis.

detaileddescription.para: This value is bounded by [0,360). Clockwise rotations are represented with positive degree values, while counterclockwise rotations are represented with negative ones.

This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The degree value or PROS_ERR_F if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Get a quaternion representing the Inertial Sensor's orientation.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The quaternion representing the sensor's orientation. If the operation failed, all the quaternion's members are filled with PROS_ERR_F and errno is set.

briefdescription.para: Get the Euler angles representing the Inertial Sensor's orientation.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The Euler angles representing the sensor's orientation. If the operation failed, all the structure's members are filled with PROS_ERR_F and errno is set.

briefdescription.para: Get the Inertial Sensor's pitch angle bounded by (-180,180)

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The pitch angle, or PROS_ERR_F if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Get the Inertial Sensor's roll angle bounded by (-180,180)

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The roll angle, or PROS_ERR_F if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Get the Inertial Sensor's yaw angle bounded by (-180,180)

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The yaw angle, or PROS_ERR_F if the operation failed, setting errno.

briefdescription.para: Get the Inertial Sensor's raw gyroscope values.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The raw gyroscope values. If the operation failed, all the structure's members are filled with PROS_ERR_F and errno is set.

briefdescription.para: Get the Inertial Sensor's raw acceleroneter values.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The raw accelerometer values. If the operation failed, all the structure's members are filled with PROS_ERR_F and errno is set.

briefdescription.para: Get the Inertial Sensor's status.

detaileddescription.para: This function uses the following values of errno when an error state is reached: ENXIO - The given value is not within the range of V5 ports (1-21). ENODEV - The port cannot be configured as an Inertial Sensor EAGAIN - The sensor is still calibrating

parameterdescription.para: The V5 Inertial Sensor port number from 1-21

simplesect.para: The Inertial Sensor's status code, or PROS_ERR if the operation failed, setting errno.
For a pros-specific usage guide on the GPS, please check out our article here.
